mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stock (shop_id, item_code, stock_stock) VALUES (#{shop_id}, #{item_code}, #{stock})
mapper.select: SELECT stock_stock FROM stock WHERE shop_id = #{shop_id} AND item_code = #{item_code}
mapper.update: UPDATE stock SET stock_stock = #{stock} WHERE shop_id = #{shop_id} AND item_code = #{item_code}
